nodes.text: The Mos Eisley Salvage Yard was a huge Imperial warehouses complex built in the outskirts of Mos Eisley, Tatooine, some time after the Battle of Yavin. That facilty was the propriety of Galactic Emperor Palpatine himself, and was guarded by a security droid. It was divided into several departments, including the fabrication assembly. The Salvage Yard housed an Optical Information Crystal that contained vital clues to the location of hidden droid factory, where a new series of assassin droids were being made. It also
